languages.text: {n}Сервитор, встроенный в огромный когитатор, поворачивает к вам голову. Из вокса доносится хриплый голос:{/n} "Здравствуй! Номос рады твоему визиту".
{n}The servitor built into the huge cogitator turns its head toward you. The vox emits a rasping voice:{/n} "Hello! Nomos welcome your visit."
languages.original_text: {n}Сервитор, встроенный в огромный когитатор, поворачивает к вам голову. Из вокса доносится хриплый голос:{/n} "Здравствуй! Номос рады твоему визиту".

traits.locale_text: {n}The servitor built into the huge cogitator turns its head toward you. The vox emits a rasping voice:{/n} "Hello! Nomos welcome your visit."
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: {n}El servidor instalado en el enorme cogitador gira la cabeza hacia ti. De su voco sale una voz jadeante:{/n} «¡Hola! Nomos recibe alegre su visita».
languages.original_text: {n}The servitor built into the huge cogitator turns its head toward you. The vox emits a rasping voice:{/n} "Hello! Nomos welcome your visit."

traits.locale_text: {n}El servidor instalado en el enorme cogitador gira la cabeza hacia ti. De su voco sale una voz jadeante:{/n} «¡Hola! Nomos recibe alegre su visita».
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: {n}巨大な考算機に組み込まれたサーヴィターがこちらに顔を向けた。ヴォクスからしゃがれた声が聞こえてきた。{/n}「こんにちは！ ノモスはあなたの訪問を歓迎する」
languages.original_text: {n}The servitor built into the huge cogitator turns its head toward you. The vox emits a rasping voice:{/n} "Hello! Nomos welcome your visit."

traits.locale_text: {n}巨大な考算機に組み込まれたサーヴィターがこちらに顔を向けた。ヴォクスからしゃがれた声が聞こえてきた。{/n}「こんにちは！ ノモスはあなたの訪問を歓迎する」
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: {n}内置在巨型沉思者里的机仆抬起头看着你，它的音阵装置中传出了沙哑的声音。{/n}“你好！诺莫斯欢迎你。”
languages.original_text: {n}The servitor built into the huge cogitator turns its head toward you. The vox emits a rasping voice:{/n} "Hello! Nomos welcome your visit."

traits.locale_text: {n}内置在巨型思考器里的奴工抬起头看着你，它的音阵装置中传出了沙哑的声音。{/n}“你好！诺莫斯欢迎你。”
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: {n}Le servitor intégré à l'énorme cogitateur tourne la tête vers vous tandis qu'une voix rauque s'élève de son vox :{/n} « Bonjour ! Nous nous réjouissons de votre visite. »
languages.original_text: {n}The servitor built into the huge cogitator turns its head toward you. The vox emits a rasping voice:{/n} "Hello! Nomos welcome your visit."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le servitor intégré à l'énorme cogitateur tourne la tête vers vous tandis qu'une voix rauque s'élève de son vox :{/n} « Bonjour ! Nous nous réjouissons de votre visite. »
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: {n}Der Servitor, der in den riesigen Cogitator eingebaut ist, dreht seinen Kopf zu dir. Das Vox gibt eine krächzende Stimme aus:{/n} "Hallo! Nomos begrüßen deinen Besuch."
languages.original_text: {n}The servitor built into the huge cogitator turns its head toward you. The vox emits a rasping voice:{/n} "Hello! Nomos welcome your visit."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Servitor, der in den riesigen Cogitator eingebaut ist, dreht seinen Kopf zu dir. Das Vox gibt eine krächzende Stimme aus:{/n} "Hallo! Nomos begrüßen deinen Besuch."
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: {n}Devasa kavramsayarın içine yerleştirilmiş hizmetör, başını sana çeviriyor. Vokstan hışırtılı bir ses geliyor.{/n} "Selam! Nomos sizi hoşnutlukla karşılıyor."
languages.original_text: {n}The servitor built into the huge cogitator turns its head toward you. The vox emits a rasping voice:{/n} "Hello! Nomos welcome your visit."

traits.locale_text: {n}Devasa kavramsayarın içine yerleştirilmiş hizmetör, başını sana çeviriyor. Vokstan hışırtılı bir ses geliyor:{/n} "Selam! Nomos, sizi hoşnutlukla karşılıyor."
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos
